definition: to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)

sentences.english: What care I for the wreaths that can only give glory ?
sentences.chinese: 對於只給人以榮譽的花環我又何所掛懷？

sentences.english: What care I for the wreaths that can only give glory?
sentences.chinese: 對於只給予人榮譽的花環我又何所掛懷？

sentences.english: We need to practice being detached from all things lest we suffer at the end.
sentences.chinese: 我們平時就要練習萬事不掛懷，免得臨終痛苦。
